snippet: New York City Marathon officials are aiming to make the event the most advanced in the world, as far as gee-whiz gadgetry goes.
abstract: New York City Marathon for 2014 could be the largest road race ever staged, with about 50,000 runners registered; host of tracking technology and cameras used by organizers, city and federal officials and private companies in wearable-technology boom could also make event the most monitored and technologically advanced marathon in world.
lead_paragraph: New York City Marathon officials are aiming to make the event the most advanced in the world, as far as gee-whiz gadgetry goes.

headline.main: With Gadgetry, New York Marathon May Be Watched Like No Other
headline.print_headline: With Gadgetry, New York Race May Be Watched Like No Other
